comment: If hxb was trimmed (called 'bias vol' for consistency with modules, but this will always be a boolean)
Number of bad (dead, noisy) cells for just this test
List of dead cells (dead is noise == 0)
List of noisy cells (for now, noisy is noise > median noise + 2 ADC counts)
yaml configuration used for this test
Relative humidity measured inside test box
User who did the test (CERN username if possible)
channel on the corresponding chip, between 0 and 71 inclusive
0 for normal cell, 1 for calibration, 100 for common mode
Median of the ADC measurment array
Inter-quartile range of the ADC measurment array
Mean of the ADC measurment array
Standard deviation of the ADC measurment array
frac_uncertainty; n = number of events; often n=10032
